author: Brian Turner
method: In a bowl, mix the cream cheese with the Dijon mustard, olive oil, white wine vinegar and tomato passata to form a thick paste. Serve in a dish with the toast, sprinkled with the spring onions.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz cream cheese ,  ½ tsp Dijon mustard,  2tbsp olive oil,  30ml/1fl oz tomato passata,  1 tsp white wine vinegar,  2 spring onions, sliced,  2 slices bread, toasted
